outputs.output_descr: The Project objective is to promote efficiency and effectiveness in the processes of licensing of forest by IBAMA.The project will achieve this through the following 6 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Promotion of Decentralization and Forest Management Shared, (ii) Implementation and improvement of control systems and forest monitoring conducted, (iii) Improved licensing practices of Forest Management Plans and Vegetation Removal, in the framework of its powers, (iv) Shares of Forest Protection and Conservation, in the framework of its competences, (v) Promotion of studies, diagnoses and evaluations regarding the use and consumption of forest products and forest protection and (vi) Implementation of Instrument for Assessing Public Management (GesPública) forest area of IBAMA.

The Project objective is to promote efficiency and effectiveness in the processes of licensing of forest by IBAMA.The project will achieve this through the following 6 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Promotion of Decentralization and Forest Management Shared, (ii) Implementation and improvement of control systems and forest monitoring conducted, (iii) Improved licensing practices of Forest Management Plans and Vegetation Removal, in the framework of its powers, (iv) Shares of Forest Protection and Conservation, in the framework of its competences, (v) Promotion of studies, diagnoses and evaluations regarding the use and consumption of forest products and forest protection and (vi) Implementation of Instrument for Assessing Public Management (GesPública) forest area of IBAMA.
